description:
Go blast some berms with your little rider. The Cujo 20 is a super-cool mini machine to kickstart a lifelong love of trail riding. Wide tires roll over roots and rocks, and dampen the ride, offering reliable traction all around. Disc brakes provide crisp, controlled stopping power and grab-able shifters are easy to operate. For trail-charging tykes, this bike handles well and is a trusty pair of wheels to learn to start exploring trails.

  • SmartForm C3 alloy frame features Cannondale's industry-leading aluminum frame building techniques for low weight and stiffness
  • Geometry maintains comfortable upright posture while riding
  • Fully rigid frame construction allows efficient climbing
  • Cable disc brakes with alloy brake levers provide responsive braking
  • Shimano Tourney Revo Twist shifters allow easy 7-speed gear changes
  • KMC Z7 chain for durable smooth drive power
  • Pro Wheel crankset powers this trail machine
  • Aluminum disc rims for a stiff but light ride
  • Wellgo composite pedals grip well but won't bite
  • 20 x 2.6 inch tires float over roots, rocks and rough patches
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for a year after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Kids Cujo 20" Bicycle - Children to Youths
